name: "Innocence" by Misty
description:
Father John Misty's "Innocence" by Misty is a female perfume created in collaboration with SANAE Intoxicants.


"Innocence" is initially being released in a very limited edition of 300 bottles as an Eau de Parfum of all natural, rare essential oils, fixed in a base of organic cane alcohol. 


"Innocence" has pure botanical fragrances of Sweet Orange Oil, Tunisian Neroli, Mimosa Absolute, Violet Absolute, Jasmine Grand, Bourbon Vanilla, and Linden Blossom.



*For anything other than standard shipping USP please email info@sanaeintoxicants.com

name: Smoking Rose
description:
Smoking Rose: Roses and grass smolder beneath the sandalwood tree. Balsam of Peru soothes the geranium heart while we admire a succulent lavender cloud, and sweet smoke drifts beneath the rainbow.


.5ml sample $17

name: Meadow Slumber
description:
Meadow Slumber: A vetiver dream rocked with drop bass notes of labdanum, soothed by the powdery sweetness of Balsam of Peru. Phrases of lavender and bergamot evoke a warm and lush napping spot in a field.

name: Bonnie Billy  "Limited edition"
description:
Bonnie Billy: Underneath the bouquet of the mukhallat, on a warm, Egyptian jasmine, tobacco night, rocks the ancient, romantic rhythm of the Assam oud. Relish in this mystical, swirling dance. It will light up all who surround you.
